name: Tiny Elephant Evolution | Tap DNA of the Crazy Mutant Clicker Game
name_original: Tiny Elephant Evolution | Tap DNA of the Crazy Mutant Clicker Game
description: Parasite from outer space had fallen in the pond in deep forests which is the habitat of wild animals and insects . One day there was a tiny elephant accidentally drank water from the pond without knowing that there is a parasite from outer space. The parasites entered to the body and started to change cells, genes and DNA of this tiny elephant. It changed this adorable elephant to a hideous monster. Moreover, it also changes the instinct of eating from plants to be carnivores . It became a scary predator because it can evolve itself by absorbing nutrients and DNA of those animal to change the body structure to get stronger .
